revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = SanDisk |model = ibi |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (H3C) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless 'cloud' storage device |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2APRXH2C |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTD1295PB;RTD1295PB, H412TE1, GH27A1 TAIWAN; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q80DVSNIG; |flash1size = 1 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = SATA, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth LE, heatsink, |addchip = 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85742-11;SKY11, 85742, 0H00P;2;, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/05/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Thailand
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The Top Side Marking of the Winbond W25Q80DVSNIG flash chip is simply 25Q80DVNIG ([https://www.winbond.com/resource-files/w25q80dv_revg_07212015.pdf Datasheet]).
The 500 GB hard drive pictured in the FCC photos for the H3C is a Western Digital WD Blue WD5000LPCX.
This FCC entry covers the H3C models and the H2C model with differences described below.
{| class="wikitable" |- !Model !HDD Capacity !AC Adapter !USB 3.0 !RAM |- |H2C |1TB/2TB/4TB |12V / 1.5A |Yes |1 GB |- |H3C |500GB |12V / 1.0A |No |512 MB |}
[[Category:English Documentation]]
